abstract: Goldman Sachs will not change its strategy because it changed into a bank holding company, the investment bank’s chief executive, Lloyd C. Blankfein, said at an investor conference on Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: Goldman Sachs will not change its strategy because it changed into a bank holding company, the investment bank’s chief executive, Lloyd C. Blankfein, said at an investor conference on Tuesday.

headline.main: Goldman’s Strategy Won’t Change With New Status, Chief Says
